message: I have a use case where as the administrator, I'd like to retain control over what topics get created in a certain group... so as the group "admin", I'd like to disallow others from creating topics. Is this possible?

if you own your own web space you can use https://github.com/italiano40/convore-php-forum which has that option and it is simple as changing a setting from false to true but convore don't have that setting built in
